questions.answer: Myriabel is an exoplanet of unparalleled beauty and wonder. This increased gravity helps retain a denser atmosphere, providing more protection from cosmic radiation. Myriabel is situated within the habitable zone of its parent star, granting it a temperate climate where liquid water can be found.
